title: Ep 45 | How Phil Wants to be Buried Someday, Origin of Zombie Movies, and No Death in Christ
description:
The Robertsons talk about how Phil wants to be buried, Jase explains how the origin of zombie movies can be traced back to Lazarus, and the guys discuss how there is no death in Christ.
